sentences.en: He had directed his first film in 1923 and had worked prolifically throughout the silent era.
sentences.cn: 1923年,沟口健二执导了他的处女作,在之后的整个默片时代里,他创作了大量作品.

sentences.en: He wrote prolifically both in Ireland and England, nearly constantly shuttling from one to the other.
sentences.cn: 他几乎不断穿梭于爱尔兰和英国之间, 并在两地写出大量作品.
